incident_updates.body: We are investigating cases of degraded performance with Pull Requests for some of our Atlassian Bitbucket Cloud customers. We will provide more details within the next hour.

components.name: Webhooks
components.description: The Bitbucket webhooks service

components.name: Website
components.description: Access to bitbucket.org

scheduled_maintenances.name: Storage infrastructure maintenance - repositories briefly read-only

incident_updates.body:
The Bitbucket team will be performing maintenance to improve our storage infrastructure. To minimize disruption, maintenance will be performed during weekends in May, June, and July 2021 (21:00 Friday - 23:00 Sunday UTC).

A subset of repositories and snippets will be processed every weekend. Each individual repository/snippet will be in a read-only state for a period of time. An active repository/snippet will be read-only for up to 30 minutes. An inactive one will be read-only for up to 4 hours.

While a repository/snippet is read-only, it cannot be modified via Bitbucket Cloud Services, including the Website, Git operations via SSH and HTTPS, API requests, and Pipelines. During this period, a git push will fail with the message “Repository is in read only mode.”

All services are expected to be back to normal after this maintenance is complete.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Database infrastructure maintenance. Up to four hours of downtime scheduled

incident_updates.body: The Bitbucket team will be performing maintenance in our database infrastructure on May 15th.  This maintenance will require up to 4 hours of downtime on all Bitbucket Cloud Services, including the Website, Git operations via SSH and HTTPS, API requests, and Pipelines. All services are expected to be back to normal after this maintenance is complete.
